item.title: Newsagent assignment
item.description: 2nd year team project (4 members) where we had to build a database access program in Java. It had to be delivered in 4 sprints uzing Agile approach. Our objective was to gradually develop a this application to interact, manage and automate specific database usage. Our final delivarable can be found on github page.
